<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.51</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global</value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns [[true]] if walk is '''toggled''' (default W+S in <template><title>arma3</title></template>).
<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative </title><part><name index="1"/><value> This command can still return true when the unit is sprinting or stopped; it only returns the '''toggle''' value of walking, not if the unit is walking right now.</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[isWalking]] unitName </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>Parameter</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_bool = [[isWalking]] [[player]];</code> </value></part><part><name>Example1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[forceWalk]], [[isForcedWalk]], [[forceSpeed]], [[getSpeed]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>

[[Category:Arma 2: Operation Arrowhead: New Scripting Commands List|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on March 8, 2015 - 21:03 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Benargee|Benargee]]</dt>
<dd class="note">To expand on the limited description, this command doesn't necessarily say whether or not the unit is currently walking. All it says is that walking is toggled on or off. This command can still return true when the unit is sprinting. When walking is toggled on, the unit will return to walking pace when not sprinting. When walking is toggled off, the unit will return to jogging pace when not sprinting. This command is not intended to gauge a units current movement speed.
</dd>
</dl>
